name: Train for Animals - BabyMagica free
description:
🚂 BabyMagica "Train for Animals" is a educational game for 2 year olds with colourful graphics, the animated animals and cheerful children's music.

In the fun game for kids it is necessary to transport all animals on stations, eliminating obstacles in engine transits.
The baby train can change colors, hoot in a whistle and start up multi-colored smoke.
And with each animal at the station it is possible to play: the hedgehog can gather musical apples; the greyish hare to gnaw carrot and to giggle cheerfully; boar catches acorns in a bag; the elephant to start up confetti and balloon pop; the monkey to blow soap bubbles (bubble pop); the cat to purr; the young fox to dance, the dog to catch a bone, the crocodile to play a ball and so forth.

EDUCATIONAL GAMES FOR KIDS

The game is designed for the little children. The kids app contains both entertaining elements: train for kids, animals for kids, colorful balls, bubbles for kids, balloon game, cars, airplanes, and simple puzzles for toddlers. The child will spend time not only with pleasure, but also with benefit (training attention, logic, memory, fine motor skills and reaction).

FEATURES OF THE APPLICATION

• fun game for kids to free play.
• "Train for Animals" for toddlers and children from 2 to 5 years old.
• in a game simple management — contact with one finger (it is very convenient for toddlers).
• the train game isn't limited on time and has no account, points and so forth.
• interactivity of characters, responsiveness and realness of the game world contributes to the development of imagination of the child, curiosity and sense of humour.
• the baby game gives the chance to the child to invent the story on the plot course.
• the children train will appeal to boys and girls.
